testcase.classname: Validation of Adactin Hotel Web Page
testcase.name: : TC_ADA_01 Validation of Adactin Hotel Booking
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Adactin Web Application...................................passed Then User Verify Adactin Login Page is Display..............................passed When User Enter the Valid Username and Password.............................passed And User Click the Login Button.............................................passed Then User Verify Search Hotel Page is Display...............................passed When User Enter Valid Location,Hotels,Room Type,Number of Room,Check in Date,Check Out Date,Adult Per Room and Child Per Room.passed And User Click the Search Button............................................passed Then User Verify Select Hotel Page is Dispaly...............................passed And User Click Radio Button.................................................passed And User Click Continue Button..............................................passed Then User Verify Book A Hotel Page is Display...............................passed When User Enter First Name,Last Name, Build Address.........................passed When User Enter Valid Cerdit Card No,Cerdit Card Type,Expiry No and CVV No..passed And User Click Book Now Button..............................................passed Then User Verify Book Confirmation Page and Order Id is Display.............passed
